metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13289 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Xpdf 4.01.01, there is a use-after-free vulnerability in the function JBIG2Stream::close() located at JBIG2Stream.cc. It can, for example, be triggered by sending a crafted PDF document to the pdftoppm tool.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> doesn't seem to reproduce in poppler ebarretto> since 0.5.12-1 libextractor does not use xpdf anymore. xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
